songs.title: All Now
songs.lyrics:
Yeah just got this check man
About  to go fuck this shit up
You  know what I’m saying
Yeah, you know what it is though?
Listen up this ain’t bullshit
BG  Knocc Out what’s up?

Yeah  I know a few hoes
I know a few hoes
And  they all from the city
And they all from the city
You know I rep cop town
Every time I come around
The  bitches all want the diddy
They want the diddy

No harm you wanna flirt
You gotta give me the skirt
Pay what I’m worth
Pay what I’m worth

Now when we get to dipping
Your nigga come here tripping
He gonna lay you in the dirt
Lay you in the dirt

Better know the pedigree
I’m repping it steadily
Young alpha line
Ain’t no nigga ahead of me
Never smiled as a child
Cause I was wild
But today here and now
I’m living for longevity

Bolo and a VIP
Three bottles of me
I’m bougie I’m acting funny with the drain
Bodies on the hunt
I ain’t giving a fuck
I can do what I want
Cause I got money in the bank

When a nigga on they wanna ride your way
When you broke them Osamas wanna hide in a cave
I was down for a minute
The top; it was intended
Catch a bar of a star
Let it shine in your face
Look now you get a preview
Wouldn’t wanna be you

Solid as a rock
But you see through like cellophane
Pac he was MOB
Me I’m Moe
What’s that?
Money over Everything
Six figure nigga
I’m for making my scrilla

We gonna spend ti all now
Cause there’s no taking it with us

Six figure nigga
I’m for making my scrilla
We gonna spend ti all now
Cause there’s no taking it with us

We gonna spend ti all now
Cause there’s no taking it with us

Hey they call me T. Dot
I got an action at the end though
Hey I heard your girl let a dot
But I ain’t heard shit about her friend though
Ha ha

You can catch me on the block
Or you can catch me on the handle
Probably visiting my ma
I’m trying to get some green
For the plug though
Can you find me living blindly
Behind the mind that was on me
And my time piece
It got a whole lotta diamonds
I don’t like bragging
Let my girl do it for me
My new whip’s sporty
This right for me
I like how the Kardashian like Courtney
I ‘m gonna kill him when I get the 24’s in
Nigga I just said I don’t like bragging
Ha ha
That don’t mean I don’t like posting
Well it’s one and the same
I’m just changing the name
Like I’m changing the game
Every time I get credit it’s never the same
I’m coming to wreck it as sure as my claim
If you don’t got respect
Then you don’t got a thing
I gain the respect
Cause I stay in my lane
Tell them knuckle up
I was down for the fame
Even now there are days
When I’m stuck in my ways

Niggas wanna run around
Talking about guns
Like I ain’t got none?
Nah

Cause the mother fucking world crazy
Just the other day a nigga
Killed his daughter and his wife
And his mother fucking baby

Something in the water
Making people go crazy
I was born in the crack era
Back pack era when your grand dad
Wore a snack pack era
I do this old shit for the squad
Like terror
I’m a six figure nigga
I’m for making that scrilla
Scrilla
And I’m gonna  spend it all night
Cause ain’t no motherfucker taking this with her

I’m a six figure nigga
I’m for making that scrilla

I’m a six figure nigga
I’m for making my scrilla

We gonna spend it all night
Cause ain’t no taking it with us

I’m a six figure nigga
I’m for making my scrilla

We gonna spend it all night
Cause ain’t no taking it with us

I’m a six figure nigga
I’m for making my scrilla

We gonna spend it all night
Cause ain’t no taking it with us
